Apple___Apple_scab.Prevention: Prune trees to improve air circulation; remove fallen leaves.
Apple___Apple_scab.Remedies: Apply fungicides such as captan or mancozeb during early growth stages.

Apple___Black_rot.Prevention: Remove mummified fruits and dead wood.
Apple___Black_rot.Remedies: Use appropriate fungicides during early fruit development.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.Prevention: Remove nearby junipers which are alternate hosts.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.Remedies: Apply protective fungicide sprays during early spring.

Blueberry___healthy.Prevention: Ensure soil pH and moisture are optimal.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.Prevention: Prune for air circulation; avoid excess nitrogen.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.Remedies: Apply sulfur-based fungicides or neem oil.

Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy.Prevention: Maintain balanced nutrients and monitor regularly.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.Prevention: Crop rotation and tilling crop residues.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.Remedies: Use fungicides like strobilurins if needed.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.Remedies: Apply fungicides at early rust stages.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.Prevention: Use resistant varieties and crop rotation.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.Remedies: Apply fungicides at early signs of infection.

Grape___Black_rot.Prevention: Prune and destroy infected shoots and leaves.
Grape___Black_rot.Remedies: Apply fungicides like myclobutanil during growth.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).Cause: Complex fungal disease caused by *Phaeomoniella chlamydospora* and others.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).Prevention: Avoid pruning during wet weather; sanitize tools.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).Remedies: No cure; remove infected vines and avoid water stress.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.Prevention: Improve air flow and remove plant debris.

Grape___healthy.Prevention: Maintain good cultural practices and monitor regularly.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).Prevention: Control psyllid vectors and use certified plants.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).Remedies: Remove infected trees; apply nutrient management.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.Cause: Bacterial disease caused by *Xanthomonas campestris pv. pruni*.
Peach___Bacterial_spot.Prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation and plant resistant varieties.

Peach___healthy.Cause: No signs of disease or pest infection.
Peach___healthy.Prevention: Monitor tree health and avoid excess moisture.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.Cause: Bacterial disease caused by *Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria*.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.Prevention: Use certified seeds and rotate crops.

Pepper,_bell___healthy.Prevention: Follow crop rotation and proper watering.

Potato___Early_blight.Prevention: Use crop rotation and remove plant debris.
Potato___Early_blight.Remedies: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil or mancozeb.

Potato___Late_blight.Prevention: Use resistant varieties and avoid overhead watering.

Potato___healthy.Prevention: Maintain crop health with good care and clean practices.

Raspberry___healthy.Cause: Healthy plant with no disease symptoms.
Raspberry___healthy.Prevention: Ensure proper spacing and regular inspection.

Soybean___healthy.Prevention: Use certified seeds and follow crop rotation.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.Prevention: Plant in full sun and avoid leaf wetting.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.Remedies: Apply potassium bicarbonate or neem oil.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.Prevention: Avoid overcrowding; water at soil level.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.Remedies: Remove infected leaves; apply fungicides if severe.

Strawberry___healthy.Prevention: Ensure good sunlight, spacing, and drainage.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.Cause: Bacterial disease caused by *Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria*.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.Prevention: Use disease-free seeds; avoid overhead watering.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.Remedies: Copper-based sprays can reduce severity; remove infected leaves.

Tomato___Early_blight.Prevention: Crop rotation and adequate spacing between plants.

Tomato___Late_blight.Prevention: Use resistant varieties and avoid excessive moisture.
Tomato___Late_blight.Remedies: Apply fungicides like mancozeb or cymoxanil.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.Prevention: Ensure good ventilation and avoid leaf wetting.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.Remedies: Use fungicides like copper or mancozeb.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.Prevention: Provide good air circulation and avoid leaf wetting.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.Remedies: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil and remove lower leaves.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.Remedies: Use miticides or neem oil; introduce predatory mites.

Tomato___Target_Spot.Remedies: Use fungicides like azoxystrobin or chlorothalonil.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.Prevention: Control whitefly population; use resistant varieties.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.Remedies: Remove infected plants; use reflective mulches and insect-proof nets.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.Cause: Viral disease spread via contact or contaminated tools.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.Prevention: Disinfect tools and avoid smoking near plants.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.Remedies: No cure; remove and destroy infected plants.
